issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly gandiva jar osx build fails
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6442](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6442). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/580191727 shows a timeout at the deploy step. Maybe you can add `travis_wait` to the command to let it go longer, or maybe it was transient.
